PluginData.Author: StarCpt
PluginData.Description:
Adds folders for the gps tab. To add gpses to a folder, set a name in the Folder Name textbox. It must be between 1 and 32 characters long, cannot contain colons and not be all whitespace characters. DO NOT delete or modify the folder information in the gps description. Other Features: - Column for gps distances from player (toggleable) - Copying and pasting whole folders if both people are using the plugin. - Show/Hide folders on hud - Double click on a folder to only browse its gpses - Button to copy all gpses to clipboard
Visit the github page for more information.
